item.name: Repair the Streets, Remove the Potholes
hint.auto.repairSomeMore: Robo could certainly repair some more potholes. Try again and/or adjust your program to see if he does better this time.
hint.auto.notAllPotholesRepaired: You did not yet mark all the potholes, but know that Robo did not run until the end. It may take a very long time to repair all potholes and we did not want to keep you waiting. Try again and/or make your program smarter to see if Robo repairs more potholes this time.
